item.title: Ex-Harvard president Larry Summers steps back from public role after Epstein email release
item.description: The former US treasury secretary says he is "ashamed" of his emails to the late sex offender.

item.title: Brazil creates new Indigenous territories during protest-hit COP30
item.description: President Lula's government recognises 10 new Indigenous lands in an effort to protect their culture and environment.

item.title: French energy giant Total faces war crimes allegations over Mozambique massacre
item.description: TotalEnergies denies responsibility for the actions of local security forces involved in dozens of killings.

item.title: Australian murderer sues for right to eat Vegemite behind bars
item.description: Andre McKechnie argues the Vegemite ban in Victoria's jails denies him the right to "enjoy his culture".

item.title: Australia detains South African seen at neo-Nazi rally
item.description: The civil engineer was seen in the front row of a protest organised by the National Socialist Network.
